text:
Pivoted from a fitness app to a simpler idea inspired by @FarzaTV's advice:
- great ideas are forged, not found
- should be something you care about

I hate waiting in class to mark attendance, headcount app will take "attendance in a minute"

cc @_buildspace @_nightsweekends s5 https://t.co/wlI1plWePO
